title: Game command
body: so I know you can tell your teammates how many gold you have by "ctrl and click gold," but today I see somebody doing this. He's trying to build a void staff and he can show us how much more gold he needs how did he do that :o

replies.body: This is part of the new cooldown pings that were released in a recent patch.  You can mouse over the item, and click it while holding down the Alt key on your keyboard.  Many things can interact with the chat now by using the mouseover+alt, like cooldowns on your abilities.  Check out the [release patch ](http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/news/game-updates/patch/patch-614-notes#patch-cooldown-pings)for more info!  Hope that helps clear things up!
